test.create_query: CREATE TABLE index_test (z UInt32, INDEX i_x (mortonDecode(2, z).1) TYPE minmax, INDEX i_y (mortonDecode(2, z).2) TYPE minmax) ENGINE = MergeTree ORDER BY z
test.fill_query: INSERT INTO index_test SELECT number * 10 FROM numbers_mt(toUInt64(0x100000000 / 10)) SETTINGS max_insert_threads=8
test.query: SELECT count() FROM index_test WHERE mortonDecode(2, z).1 >= 20000 AND mortonDecode(2, z).1 <= 20100 AND mortonDecode(2, z).2 >= 10000 AND mortonDecode(2, z).2 <= 10100
